main_topic.author: OminousDude
main_topic.title: Are new models useful?
main_topic.content: Recently 3 new versions of the biggest models for this competition have had new versions? If you have tested them what are your first impressions for Llama 3 -> Llama 3.1, Gemma 1 -> Gemma 2, Mistral -> Mistral Nemo?
